metadata.Title: CVE-2021-38092 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Integer Overflow vulnerability in function filter_prewitt in libavfilter/vf_convolution.c in Ffmpeg 4.2.1, allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service or other unspecified impacts.

notes.Note: ebarretto> ffmpeg: same fix as CVE-2020-20898

criterions.comment: vice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
